data.title: Hole accidentally cut in U.K. museum floor reveals stairs to hidden tomb of five archbishops

Easyjet forced couple off overbooked flight with no compensation. The two passengers, who had booked non-refundable accommodation in Italy, were told that the next available Easyjet flight was four days later.
